Name: Top Run
About the game: Top Run is endless runner with platformer elements. Play as Kevin and his dog Buddy and make your way through the neon city full of dangerous enemies. • Run as far as you can and get the best score • Use superpowers to survive epic battles while you run! • Shoot floppies to kill enemies • Collect pixels to upgrade your abilities and gain more power! • Level up and customize your 80’s room • Complete 100+ missions • Tons of cool skins from 80s movies and 80s cartoons • In-game cheats • Easy to learn and hard to master (we believe in you!) • Tons of explosions and fun
Meta Title: Top Run: Feb 10, 2020, Katata Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Top Run? Check out the release date (Feb 10, 2020), developer insights from Katata Games, and a complete game summary.
